about_the_game:
Missing the games from the 8 and 16-bit era? Then you’ve come to the right place! Red Head is a game that was born with the intention of bringing back the feeling that these classic games conveyed. The game we created combines the experience of decades of gameplay from console games like NES, Mega Drive, and SNES.

Rescue the gem stolen by the evil sorcerer Vamoth and restore peace to the kingdom. Prepare yourself to face a wide variety of enemies, such as slimes, evil trees, and giant bosses that occupy almost the entire screen.
Use your powerful kick to create a whirlwind that sweeps everything in its path.
Find secret areas and collect all the hidden collectibles in the game.

All this and much more you will find in Red Head, a pixel art game made by gamers for gamers.
